SELECT p.ID,p.PROCESS_NAME,
g.ID as g_id,g.GOODS_NAME as g_goodsName,g.GOODS_CODE as g_goodsCode FROM process p LEFT JOIN process_goods pg ON p.id=pg.p_id LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.id=pg.g_id WHERE p.id=pg.p_id

SELECT p.ID,p.PROCESS_NAME,
g.ID as g_id,g.GOODS_NAME as g_goodsName,g.GOODS_CODE as g_goodsCode FROM process p LEFT JOIN process_goods pg ON p.id=pg.p_id LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.id=pg.g_id WHERE p.PROCESS_NAME = #{processName}

SELECT g.ID, g.GOODS_NAME, g.cover_image_uri, g.goods_unit, g.goods_specification, gp.member_price, gp.retail_price, gb.brand_code, gc.category_code, gt.type_code FROM PROCESS p LEFT JOIN PROCESS_GOODS pg ON pg.p_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN GOODS g ON g.ID = pg.g_ID LEFT JOIN GOODS_BRAND gb ON gb.ID = g.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN GOODS_CATEGORY gc ON gc.ID = g.CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN GOODS_TYPE gt ON gt.ID = g.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN GOODS_PRICE gp ON gp.GOODS_ID = g.ID LEFT JOIN APP_STORE s ON s.ID = gp.STORE_ID LEFT JOIN APP_EMPLOYEE e ON e.STORE_ID = s.ID WHERE e.ID = #{userId} AND p.ID = #{processId}

SELECT g.ID, g.GOODS_NAME, g.cover_image_uri, g.goods_unit, g.goods_specification, gp.member_price, gp.retail_price, gb.brand_code, gc.category_code, gt.type_code FROM PROCESS p LEFT JOIN PROCESS_GOODS pg ON pg.p_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN GOODS g ON g.ID = pg.g_ID LEFT JOIN GOODS_BRAND gb ON gb.ID = g.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN GOODS_CATEGORY gc ON gc.ID = g.CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN GOODS_TYPE gt ON gt.ID = g.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN GOODS_PRICE gp ON gp.GOODS_ID = g.ID LEFT JOIN APP_STORE s ON s.ID = gp.STORE_ID LEFT JOIN app_customer c ON c.STORE_ID = s.ID WHERE e.ID = #{userId} AND p.ID = #{processId}
